# GitHub Actions & Templates

This folder can contain:

## Suggested Files

### Issue Templates
`.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md`
`.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md`

### Pull Request Template
`.github/pull_request_template.md`

### GitHub Actions (CI/CD)
`.github/workflows/deploy.yml` - Auto-deploy on push
`.github/workflows/test.yml` - Run tests on PR

## Future Additions

When ready to add CI/CD:
1. Create workflow files in `.github/workflows/`
2. Add issue templates for better bug reporting
3. Configure branch protection rules
4. Set up automated deployments

For now, this directory structure is prepared but workflows are not yet configured.
